platen-subscript-image.title: Subscript
platen-subscript-image.description: Add text in a subscript element.

fields.name: selection
fields.title: Subscript Text: This is the text for the subscript itself. The text may be any inline Markdown.

fields.name: style
fields.title: Style: Specify the name of the style to use, if any. Alternatively, specify the dot-path of the preset you want to use after the prefix `preset:`, like `preset:foo`.

fields.name: class
fields.title: Class List: Specify any classes to add to the subscript in a space-separated list. To specify classes with the default style, set style to '.'
